63 /*========== Macros and Definitions =========================================*/

65 /*========== Extern Constant and Variable Declarations ======================*/
66 
67 /**
68  * Variable containing the state machine state for the MC33775A driver.
69  */
70 extern N775_STATE_s n775_stateBase;
71 
72 /*========== Extern Function Prototypes =====================================*/
73 
74 /**
75  * @brief trigger function for the N775 driver state machine.
76  *
77  * This function contains the sequence of events in the N775 state machine.
78  * It must be called time-triggered, every 1ms.
79  *
80  * @param n775_state state of the N775A driver
81  *
82  */
83 extern void N775_Meas(N775_STATE_s *n775_state);
84 
85 /**
86  * @brief gets the measurement initialization status.
87  *
88  * @param n775_state state of the N775A driver
89  *
90  * @return true if a first measurement cycle was made, false otherwise
91  *
92  */
93 extern bool N775_IsFirstMeasurementCycleFinished(N775_STATE_s *n775_state);
94 
95 /**
96  * @brief trigger a write on the I2C bus of the slave.
97  *
98  * @param module module number to address in the daisy-chain
99  * @param deviceAddress address of the I2C device addressed
100  * @param pData data to write on I2C bus
101  * @param dataLength number of bytes to write
102  *
103  */
104 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e N775_I2cWrite(uint8_t module, uint8_t deviceAddress, uint8_t *pData, uint8_t dataLength);
105 
106 /**
107  * @brief trigger a read on the I2C bus of the slave, first write address of register to read.
108  *
109  * @param module module number to address in the daisy-chain
110  * @param deviceAddress address of the I2C device addressed
111  * @param pDataWrite data written on I2C bus
112  * @param writeDataLength number of bytes to write
113  * @param pDataRead data read on I2C bus
114  * @param readDataLength number of bytes to read
115  *
116  */
117 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e N775_I2cWriteRead(
118  uint8_t module,
119  uint8_t deviceAddress,
120  uint8_t *pDataWrite,
121  uint8_t writeDataLength,
122  uint8_t *pDataRead,
123  uint8_t readDataLength);
124 /**
125  * @brief trigger a read on the I2C bus of the slave.
126  *
127  * @param module module number to address in the daisy-chain
128  * @param deviceAddress address of the I2C device addressed
129  * @param pData data read on I2C bus
130  * @param dataLength number of bytes to read
131  *
132  */
133 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e N775_I2cRead(uint8_t module, uint8_t deviceAddress, uint8_t *pData, uint8_t dataLength);
134

139 extern void TEST_N775_SetFirstMeasurementCycleFinished(N775_STATE_s *n775_state);
140 /* End test functions */
141 #endif

143 #endif /* FOXBMS__NXP_MC33775A_H_ */
